text: (islaamee shareeyat mein to unaka ye haal hai) aur agar ham banee isarail kee tarah unapar ye hukm jaaree kar dete ki tum apane aapako qatl kar daalo ya shahar badar ho jao to unamen se chand aadamiyon ke siva ye log to usako na karate aur agar ye log is baat par amal karate jisakee unhen naseehat kee jaatee hai to unake haq mein bahut behatar hota
